 Ensure that srand has been seeded. Safe to call multiple times.
void affxutil::affy_seed_srand ()
 Seed srand with data from the system env Or from 'APT_DEBUG_SRAND_SEED' on unix. It will always set the srand seed when called.

Define Documentation

#define AFFY_DEBUG_SRAND_SEED_ENVVAR   "APT_DEBUG_SRAND_SEED"

The env var to read the seed to srand from on unix. This is handy for debugging.

#define AFFY_GUID_FORMAT_RFC4122   1

RFC4122 v4 Guid => 09fdee5a-b19e-4101-0668-0840519ad701 Classic APT Guid => 0000007361-1232759575-1336980168-0774759233-0407464966

The format of the guids affxutil::GenerateNewGuid() will make. Comment it out for the old format.
